locations.clue_value: The silence of the art conceals the truth.
locations.name: Louvre Museum
locations.npc_dialogue: They say the art speaks in whispers, but I hear only silence.

locations.clue_value: The hidden masterpiece is not what it seems.
locations.name: Montmartre
locations.npc_dialogue: The artists here paint with shadows, but the real masterpiece is hidden.

locations.name: Seine River
locations.npc_dialogue: The river flows with secrets, but beware of the reflections.

locations.clue_value: The past holds keys, but not all doors lead to truth.
locations.name: Brandenburg Gate
locations.npc_dialogue: History stands tall, but the past can be a deceptive guide.

locations.clue_value: Loyalty can shift like the wind.
locations.name: Checkpoint Charlie
locations.npc_dialogue: Crossing borders is easy; crossing loyalties is not.

locations.clue_value: Lies can obscure the truth behind vibrant colors.
locations.name: East Side Gallery
locations.npc_dialogue: Art tells stories, but some are painted over with lies.

locations.clue_value: Untold tales may hold the key to understanding.
locations.name: Rijksmuseum
locations.npc_dialogue: Every brushstroke has a tale, but some tales are better left untold.

locations.clue_value: True reflections reveal more than they show.
locations.name: Canal Ring
locations.npc_dialogue: The canals reflect the city, but not all reflections are true.

locations.clue_value: Honesty can be a rare commodity in the shadows.
locations.name: Anne Frank House
locations.npc_dialogue: History whispers here, but listen closely; not all whispers are honest.

description: In the heart of Paris, a series of cryptic messages have surfaced, hinting at a clandestine operation involving a stolen artifact. As you delve deeper, the lines between ally and adversary blur, revealing a web of deceit that stretches across borders. Can you untangle the threads before the shadows consume you?
